All Classes

  • Class Description
    Account
    This class represents an account for the Other Bank company.
    AccountController  
    AccountDTO
    This class follows the Data Transfer Object design pattern.
    AccountRepository
    Interface for generic CRUD operations on Account repository for specific type Account.
    AccountService  
    AccountServiceImpl
    This class is a facade for all Account services.
    Address
    This class represents an address for the Other Bank company.
    AddressDTO
    This class encapsulates all the data for an address.
    ApplicationException
    This abstract exception is the superclass of all application exception.

    DuplicateKeyException
    This exception is throw when an object already exists in the persistent layer and we want to add another one with the same identifier.

    This servlet takes the exception message from the HttpServletRequest and displays it creating dynamicaly a HTML page
